inclusion.criterion: psychosocially, mentally, and physically able to comply with protocol
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: willing and able to participate in post-operative follow up evaluations for 2 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: no previous surgical intervention at the involved fusion level(s)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: women of child-bearing potential must not be pregnant or nursing, and agrees to not get pregnant for 1 year following surgery
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: systemic infection or infection at the surgical site
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: medical condition that would interfere with post-operative assessments and care
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: concurrent disease process that would place the subject in excessive risk to surgery
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: pregnant/breastfeeding at the time of enrollment, or plans to become pregnant during the course of the study
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: participating in another clinical study that could confound results
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma and is currently experiencing severe lower extremity weakness and urinary retention. The patient's condition may require spinal fusion surgery, which would make them eligible for the trial.
